headline: Prediction: Soaring Palantir Stock Will Continue to Defy Analysts' Expectations Through 2026
summary: Palantir's revenue and profits are soaring, but its valuation is out of hand.  The company's AI platform is a must-have for government and commercial clients.  Wall Street is divided on the stock, but I think the future is clear.

headline: Is Palantir Set to Drop Nearly 30%?
summary: Palantir stock soared more than 300% last year and has continued to march higher.  Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ: PLTR) has surged in the double-digits this year even as many other tech stocks struggled -- and the artificial intelligence (AI) software company's valuation also has soared.  Now, is Palantir set to drop nearly 30% as the average Wall Street forecast suggests?

headline: Prediction: 2 Monster Growth Stocks Will Be Worth More Than Palantir Technologies by 2030
summary: Palantir Technologies currently has a market value of $330 billion, but AppLovin and MercadoLibre could top that figure in no more than four years.  AppLovin has developed a superior artificial intelligence (AI)-powered targeting engine called Axon, which helps brands optimize ad campaign performance.  MercadoLibre is not only the largest e-commerce marketplace in Latin America, but also the leading retail advertising company in the region.

headline: 2 Brilliant Growth Stocks to Buy Now and Hold for the Long Term
summary: Palantir continues to benefit from explosive commercial client growth and increased focus on AI implementation.  CrowdStrike's strong customer retention, surging Falcon Flex adoption, and AI-driven edge with Charlotte AI make it a compelling long-term buy -- even at a premium valuation.  Growth stock investing hasn't been easy in 2025.
